snippet.title: ZERO Sievert | Early Access OUT NOW Trailer [4K]
snippet.description:
THE HUNT IS ON

The gate is open and the wasteland is waiting for you if you dare to step into it. Or we could just push you, I've bet 3000 roubles you don't make it back...

Ensure your survival by buying Zero Sievert here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1782120/ZERO_Sievert/

🗺️ Five procedurally-generated areas spanning across a variety of terrain
🤫 Looting to your heart's content with hundreds of combinations of what you can find 
Secrets
🧭 Gather Quests from friends and foe
🏗️ Customize your base to suit your hunting needs!
🛡️ Defend yourself against an irradiated wasteland filled with the stuff of nightmares
🥛 IGOR is out there. You have a choice. Choose wisely. 

Hold up before you go! You can't be without your trusty SURVIVAL GUIDE to help you navigate the wasteland outside this bunker, we'd expect it to boost your chances of survival by at least 0.03%.

The guide contains tips and tricks galore - from how to craft weapons and upgrade your base, to bios on the humans and creatures waiting to take you down. 

May luck be on your side, you're gonna need it!

Join our newsletter to get your FREE survival guide!: http://eepurl.com/hWuO85

The world you once knew has ended and a new dawn has taken its place. Across the swamps, forests and towns of an atmospheric, post-apocalyptic wasteland, ZERO Sievert tasks you with a simple challenge. 

Survive.

Buy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1782120/ZERO_Sievert/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ZeroSievert
Get in the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/sievert

☣️ Developed by CABO Studio
🐺 Published by Modern Wolf
